<Text: List of First Ladies of the United States:  Nonetheless, she attends many official ceremonies and functions of state either along with or in place of the president.>

Text: List of First Ladies of the United States:  Traditionally, the First Lady does not hold outside employment while occupying the office.

Text: List of First Ladies of the United States:  The Office of the First Lady is also in charge of all social and ceremonial events of the White House, and is a branch of the Executive Office of the President.
